name: Imagine: Pet Hospital
description:
'Imagine: Pet Hospital' is an educational vet clinic simulator for PC. It was published by Ubisoft, and released on September 4th, 2008. Despite it being part of the 'Imagine' chain of games, it was also sold separately as 'Petz Vet'; 'Petz' being another franchise that Ubisoft issued.

Urgent attention needed! Nurse back to health over 20+ animals, ranging from a free selection of dogs, cats, birds, rabbits and reptiles, as your child learns the intricacies of what it takes to become a vet. Diagnose pets with medical conditions, and use tools and appliances that would often be used to treat ill animals, backed up by professional veterinarians.
